channel.title: Practical Spiral Dynamics on Save The World
channel.description: Recent content in Practical Spiral Dynamics on Save The World

item.title: Field Guide
item.description: How do we know what color level someone or group is at? To figure this out there are some questions we need to answer: Are they more individual focused (tick) or group focused (tock)? What do they know to be True? What are they willing to die for? Let’s go through the color levels again, but this time asking those questions. Beige (FirstAwakening) At Beige focus starts on the individual family (tick).
